channel.title: Need thing to make it so u have to sign up on forums to log in

item.title: Need thing to make it so u have to sign up on forums to log in
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

I reckon this would take very long to make. It means connecting to your forums or constantly updating the list on your server of who has registered. I suggest just hiring moderators to police your server. If they spot someone who hasnâ€™t registered, they ask them to do so.

Though, if someone can do this, I imagine it could be very useful.
